channel.title: Eclipse File Sharing
channel.description: I was wondering if there was a way to share files with another person when using Eclipse. I want to use the same method Dropbox uses, but I'm not exactly sure if there is a way to do this. If anyone knows a plugin or method that allows this, please help me out.
